WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

The Tool has a method GetApplication. (See next lines)
Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application application = (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application) axEDOffice1.GetApplication();

(Because I want to use the NetOffice Api to excecute commands.)


Is that possible ?

Thanks a lot,
Andreas
